t: Brand Stores: Kostenlos eine Markenseite auf Amazon erstellen | Amazon Ads
s: Nur Marken mit einer angemeldeten oder eingetragenen Marke können einen Brand Store auf Amazon einrichten. Bei Marken-Neukunden, die einen Store besucht haben, war die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines Kaufs um 62,7 % höher als bei denen, die keinen Store besucht haben.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

2 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Brand owners How to build your brand with Amazon DE
s: No matter how big your brand is, with Amazon stores, you can tell your customers about your story, your vision, and your products. You can use the Store Builder in the Advertising Console to create an e-commerce storefront on Amazon. No programming or design knowledge is required for this.
